rules_text:
If a creature would die, exile it instead with an ancestry counter on it.
Kahroba gets +X/+X, where X is the total power of creature cards exiled with ancestry counters on them.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are four or more cards exiled with ancestry counters on them, transform Kahroba.
rules_text2:
Flying, hexproof
At the beginning of your end step, put an exiled card with an ancestry counter on it on the bottom of its owner's library, then scry 2. If there is exactly one card exiled with an ancestry counter on it, transform Atieh.
